titleStmt.title: The copie of a paper presented to the Parliament and read the 27th. of the fourth moneth, 1659. Subscribed by more than fifteen thousand hands. Thus directed: to the Parliament of England, from many thousand of the free born people of this Common-Wealth.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.W. for Giles Calvert at the Black-spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library..

place.placeName: the Black-spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls
